files.patch:
@@ -539,4 +539,0 @@
-          --with-toolchain-path=${HOME}/sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch }}/
-          --with-freetype-lib=${HOME}/sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch }}/usr/lib/${{ matrix.gnu-arch }}-linux-gnu${{ matrix.gnu-flavor}}/
-          --with-freetype-include=${HOME}/sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch }}/usr/include/freetype2/
-          --x-libraries=${HOME}/sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch }}/usr/lib/${{ matrix.gnu-arch }}-linux-gnu${{ matrix.gnu-flavor}}/

@@ -195,0 +195,10 @@
+        if test "x$FOUND_FREETYPE" != "xyes" ; then
+          LIB_CHECK_POTENTIAL_FREETYPE([$FREETYPE_BASE_DIR/include],
+              [$FREETYPE_BASE_DIR/lib/$OPENJDK_TARGET_CPU-linux-$OPENJDK_TARGET_ABI], [well-known location])
+        fi
+
+        if test "x$FOUND_FREETYPE" != "xyes" ; then
+          LIB_CHECK_POTENTIAL_FREETYPE([$FREETYPE_BASE_DIR/include],
+              [$FREETYPE_BASE_DIR/lib/$OPENJDK_TARGET_CPU_AUTOCONF-linux-$OPENJDK_TARGET_ABI], [well-known location])
+        fi
+

@@ -71,0 +71,4 @@
+          elif test -f "$SYSROOT/usr/lib/$OPENJDK_TARGET_CPU-linux-$OPENJDK_TARGET_ABI/libX11.so"; then
+            x_libraries="$SYSROOT/usr/lib/$OPENJDK_TARGET_CPU-linux-$OPENJDK_TARGET_ABI/libX11.so"
+          elif test -f "$SYSROOT/usr/lib/$OPENJDK_TARGET_CPU_AUTOCONF-linux-$OPENJDK_TARGET_ABI/libX11.so"; then
+            x_libraries="$SYSROOT/usr/lib/$OPENJDK_TARGET_CPU_AUTOCONF-linux-$OPENJDK_TARGET_ABI/libX11.so"

@@ -241,0 +241,27 @@
+# Support macro for PLATFORM_EXTRACT_TARGET_AND_BUILD.
+# Converts autoconf style OS name to OpenJDK style, into
+# VAR_ABI.
+AC_DEFUN([PLATFORM_EXTRACT_VARS_FROM_ABI],
+[
+  case "$1" in
+    *linux*-musl)
+      VAR_ABI=musl
+      ;;
+    *linux*-gnu)
+      VAR_ABI=gnu
+      ;;
+    *linux*-gnueabi)
+      VAR_ABI=gnueabi
+      ;;
+    *linux*-gnueabihf)
+      VAR_ABI=gnueabihf
+      ;;
+    *linux*-gnuabi64)
+      VAR_ABI=gnuabi64
+      ;;
+    *)
+      VAR_ABI=default
+      ;;
+  esac
+])
+
@@ -262,0 +289,1 @@
+  PLATFORM_EXTRACT_VARS_FROM_ABI($build_os)
@@ -278,0 +306,1 @@
+  OPENJDK_BUILD_CPU_AUTOCONF="$build_cpu"
@@ -279,0 +308,1 @@
+  OPENJDK_BUILD_ABI="$VAR_ABI"
@@ -286,0 +316,1 @@
+  AC_SUBST(OPENJDK_BUILD_CPU_AUTOCONF)
@@ -287,0 +318,1 @@
+  AC_SUBST(OPENJDK_BUILD_ABI)
@@ -300,0 +332,1 @@
+  PLATFORM_EXTRACT_VARS_FROM_ABI($host_os)
@@ -316,0 +349,1 @@
+  OPENJDK_TARGET_CPU_AUTOCONF="$host_cpu"
@@ -318,0 +352,1 @@
+  OPENJDK_TARGET_ABI="$VAR_ABI"
@@ -327,0 +362,1 @@
+  AC_SUBST(OPENJDK_TARGET_CPU_AUTOCONF)
@@ -328,0 +364,1 @@
